title: Tour de France Revival at Ineos Grenadiers: Could Geraint Thomas and Dave Brailsford Lead Team into New Era?
content:
Grand tour mastermind Brailsford is stepping away from soccer. Could he and retiring Thomas salvage the Ineos Sport empire with a new-look Grenadiers?

Read the full article at Tour de France Revival at Ineos Grenadiers: Could Geraint Thomas and Dave Brailsford Lead Team into New Era? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
